title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. – Episode 5 – Don't Look Like Him To Me
description:
May 20, 2019 / Keith Davis Jr. finally gets his day in court as his first trial begins and he comes faces to face with the four officers who shot him.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Spencer Burdette, Chris Zabriskie, and Taylor Quimby.

This episode was sponsored by Family Ghosts and Audible.

Subscribe to Family Ghosts wherever you get your podcasts.

Visit www.Audible.com/UNDISCLOSEDHEADS or text UNDISCLOSEDHEADS to 500-500
